All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bases
Base interface for managing the types of base sizes available
Bases.BaseSize
enum containing the sizes available for the pizza Bases type
Cheeses
Cheeses interface for managing the types of Cheese available
Cheeses.Cheese
enum containing the cheeses available for the pizza cheese type
CustomerOrder
Customer Ordering class used for creating multiple types of pizzas, and storing Orders in an order object, to be returned by a calling class.
CustomPizza
Custom Pizza allows the addition of extra toppings for a more delicious Pizza.
Launcher
The entry point for launching the application.
Menu
Singleton class which defines a menu that contains items that can be ordered from.
MenuItem
Represents an item that can be ordered from the menu.
MenuLoader
Class to provide management for the loading, saving and parsing of text data retrieved from the PizzaMenu.txt file, stored in the assets package.
MenuPizza
MenuPizza provides a selection for ordering pre-organised Pizzas from the menu.
Order
Object model to manage an individual order.
OrderInOutException
Exception thrown if an order is not processed correctly.
OrderUnavailableException
Exception thrown if an order request is not able to be completed.
Pizza
Pizza combines the required basic elements of a pizza, being the base, sauce and cheese, and 5 additional toppings.
PizzaFormatException
Exception thrown when an error is thrown while parsing the text file using MenuLoader.
Sauces
Sauce interface for managing the types of sauces available
Sauces.Sauce
enum containing the cheeses available for the pizza sauce type
TooManyToppingsException
Exception thrown when too many toppings are attempted to be added to a pizza
Topping
The Topping enum represents possible toppings that can be placed on a Pizza.
